nodes.text: The Belgaroth asteroid field was an asteroid field located in the the galaxy. The field was known to have ore and to employ DLC-13 mining droids to extract it. At some point, during the Imperial Era the B1-series battle droid R0-GR visited the field and wrote on his autobiography From Trenches to Wrenches: The Roger Story that the field was a horrible hutt hideaway.

The Belgaroth asteroid field first appeared in the LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures Season One episode "The Mines of Graballa", but was later canonized in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Droidography. In the episode the asteroid belt is where Graballa the Hutt had mine and Rowan Freemaker discovered one of the crystals for the Kyber Saber.
